00008 #include <cmath>
00009 #include "lcio.h"
00010 #include <LCHcalCalibrationObject.hh>
00011 
00012 using namespace lcio;
00013 
00014 namespace CALICE {
00015 
00016 class TcmtSaturationConstants;
00017 
00026 class TcmtSaturationConstants: public LCHcalCalibrationObject{
00027 
00028 public:
00029   
00030   TcmtSaturationConstants() {};
00031   
00032   TcmtSaturationConstants(unsigned chip, unsigned channel, float value, float error) {
00033     unsigned _cellId = (chip << 8) + channel;
00034     setCellKey(_cellId);
00035     obj()->setFloatVal(0, value);
00036     obj()->setFloatVal(1, error);
00037   };
00038   
00039   TcmtSaturationConstants(LCObject* obj): LCHcalCalibrationObject(obj) {};
00040   
00041   virtual ~TcmtSaturationConstants() {};
00042 
00045   float getCpixValue() const {
00046     return getFloatVal(0);
00047   };  
00048 
00051   float getCpixError() const {  
00052     return getFloatVal(1);
00053   };
00054   
00057   float applyCalibration(float inputValue) const {
00058     double cpix = getCpixValue();
00059     float corrFactor = 1.0 / (1.0 - inputValue * cpix );
00060     return (float) (inputValue * corrFactor);
00061   };
00062   
00065   float cancelCalibration(float outputValue) const {
00066     double cpix = getCpixValue();
00067     float cancelFactor = 1.0 / (1.0 + outputValue * cpix );
00068     return (float) (outputValue * cancelFactor);
00069   };
00070   
00073   float applyCalibrationError(float inputValue, float inputError) const {
00074     // z = x/(1-xy) ==> dZ = z^2 * sqrt[dx^2/x^4 + dy^2]
00075     double x = inputValue;
00076     double dx = inputError;
00077     double dy = getCpixError();
00078     double z = applyCalibration(inputValue);
00079     double dz = pow(z,2) * sqrt(pow(dx/(x*x),2) + pow(dy,2));
00080     return (float)dz;
00081   };
00082 
00085   float cancelCalibrationError(float outputValue, float outputError) const {
00086     // x = z/(1+zy) ==> dx = x^2 * sqrt[dz^2/z^4 + dy^2]
00087     double z = outputValue;
00088     double dz = outputError;
00089     double dy = getCpixError();
00090     double x = cancelCalibration(outputValue);
00091     double dx = pow(x,2) * sqrt(pow(dz/(z*z),2) + pow(dy,2));
00092     return (float)dx;
00093   };
00094 
00097   bool calibrationValid() const {
00098     return (!std::isnan(getCpixValue()) && (getCpixValue()>0));
00099   };
00100 
00103   bool keepEvent(float resultValue, float resultError) const {
00104     return true;
00105   };
00106 
00109   void print (std::ostream& os);
00110   
00113   const std::string getTypeName() const {
00114     return "TcmtSaturationConstants";
00115   };   
00116 
00119   const std::string getDataDescription() const {
00120     return "i:CellKey,f:CpixValue,f:CpixError";
00121   };  
00122     
00123 };
00124 
00125 }
00126 
00127 #endif
